gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 123, Grizzlies 92
gameRecap.excerpt: The Kings defeated the Grizzlies, 123-92.  Malik Monk recorded a season high 27 points along with 5 rebounds and 5 assists.  De’Aaron Fox added 24 points, 4 rebounds and 4 assists.  Ja Morant recorded 17 points in the loss.  The Kings improve to 19-12 on the year while the loss moves Memphis to 10-22.
